title: Pandit's remarks at Citi's 2011 annual meeting.
summary: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit addressed shareholders at the company's 2011 annual meeting in New York on April 21. View the footage of his speech on Citi's YouTube channel.
tag-1: Pandit's remarks at Citi's 2011 annual meeting.
